Rectangle - Class in corrector.figure.shape
Title : Rectangle Class that instantiates an object of type ractangle
Contact - Web Site
Rectangle() - Constructor for class corrector.figure.shape.Rectangle
default constructor
Rectangle(Point2D) - Constructor for class corrector.figure.shape.Rectangle
Constructor of a rectangle from a given point in parameter. a small rectangle of 40x40 pixels is created at the same time, exclusively for the handling of one of the fundamental points of a figure.
